sentences.sContent: You might think of this new medium as books we watch, or tele­vision we read.
sentences.sContent_eng: You might think of this new medium as books we watch, or tele­vision we read.
sentences.sCn: 你可以将这种全新的媒体想象成自己所看的书，也可以将它们想象成电视。

sentences.sContent: Communication, including broadband web access, video conferencing and tele-presence allows us to talk with people remotely almost without any problems.
sentences.sContent_eng: Communication, including broadband web access, video conferencing and tele-presence allows us to talk with people remotely almost without any problems.
sentences.sCn: 通过宽带网络、视频会议和远程展示，使得我们可以几乎毫无障碍地与远程人员进行交流。

sentences.sContent: The different ways men 'sit on their rock' include reading a newspaper or magazine, playing squash, fishing, tennis, golf, fixing something or watching tele- vision.
sentences.sContent_eng: The different ways men 'sit on their rock' include reading a newspaper or magazine, playing squash, fishing, tennis, golf, fixing something or watching tele- vision.
sentences.sCn: 男人“坐在他们石头上”的方式各不相同，有的看报纸或杂志、有的打壁球或钓鱼、有的打打网球或高尔夫、有的修东西或看电视。
